title: Welcome to Middle-Earth
description: Middle-Earth is a treasure trove of cultures and peoples. From hobbits to elves to men to dwarves, there's no telling what you might find just around the corner. Visit the dwarven mines of Moria, sleep under the eaves of Lothlorien, or ory in the greatness of Gondor.

services.title: Transportation
services.intro: There are many ways to get where you're going in Middle Earth, and every mode of transportation takes the scenic route.

services.title: Tours
services.intro: Althought Middle-Earth doesn't get many tourists, those tours that are offered are renowed for their colourful guides and the life-changing/threatening journey the customer embarks upon.
lists: Keep it Secret Keep it Safe Tours
They're Taking the Hobbits to Isengard Tours
